prompts: Create a playful cat-like Pokemon with golden coin accents and a mischievous grin.
I want a sleek, bipedal Pokemon that embodies agility and charm, with a shiny, golden color.
Generate a Normal-type Pokemon that resembles a small feline, featuring large ears and a long tail.
Make an adorable cat Pokemon that loves shiny objects and can be found in urban environments.
Imagine a Pokemon with a unique blend of brown and cream colors, showcasing its stealthy personality.
Design a small Pokemon that is both cute and cunning, known for its thieving antics.
Show me a Pokemon that has a charming appearance and is always on the lookout for treasures.
